Browse the source code of netbsd/external/ibm-public/postfix/dist/src/global/header_opts.h

1/* $NetBSD: header_opts.h,v 1.2 2017/02/14 01:16:45 christos Exp $ */
2
3#ifndef _HEADER_OPTS_H_INCLUDED_
4#define _HEADER_OPTS_H_INCLUDED_
5
6/*++
7/* NAME
8/* header_opts 3h
9/* SUMMARY
10/* message header classification
11/* SYNOPSIS
12/* #include <header_opts.h>
13/* DESCRIPTION
14/* .nf
15
16 /* External interface. */
17
18typedef struct {
19 const char *name; /* name, preferred capitalization */
20 int type; /* type, see below */
21 int flags; /* flags, see below */
22} HEADER_OPTS;
23
24 /*
25 * Header types. If we reach 31, we must group the headers we need to
26 * remember at the beginning, or we should use fd_set bit sets.
27 */
28#define HDR_OTHER 0
29#define HDR_APPARENTLY_TO 1
30#define HDR_BCC 2
31#define HDR_CC 3
32#define HDR_CONTENT_LENGTH 4
33#define HDR_CONTENT_TRANSFER_ENCODING 5
34#define HDR_CONTENT_TYPE 6
35#define HDR_DATE 7
36#define HDR_DELIVERED_TO 8
37#define HDR_ERRORS_TO 9
38#define HDR_FROM 10
39#define HDR_MESSAGE_ID 11
40#define HDR_RECEIVED 12
41#define HDR_REPLY_TO 13
42#define HDR_RESENT_BCC 14
43#define HDR_RESENT_CC 15
44#define HDR_RESENT_DATE 16
45#define HDR_RESENT_FROM 17
46#define HDR_RESENT_MESSAGE_ID 18
47#define HDR_RESENT_REPLY_TO 19
48#define HDR_RESENT_SENDER 20
49#define HDR_RESENT_TO 21
50#define HDR_RETURN_PATH 22
51#define HDR_RETURN_RECEIPT_TO 23
52#define HDR_SENDER 24
53#define HDR_TO 25
54#define HDR_MAIL_FOLLOWUP_TO 26
55#define HDR_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION 27
56#define HDR_CONTENT_DISPOSITION 28
57#define HDR_CONTENT_ID 29
58#define HDR_MIME_VERSION 30
59#define HDR_DISP_NOTIFICATION 31
60
61 /*
62 * Header flags.
63 */
64#define HDR_OPT_DROP (1<<0) /* delete from input */
65#define HDR_OPT_SENDER (1<<1) /* sender address */
66#define HDR_OPT_RECIP (1<<2) /* recipient address */
67#define HDR_OPT_RR (1<<3) /* Resent- header */
68#define HDR_OPT_EXTRACT (1<<4) /* extract flag */
69#define HDR_OPT_MIME (1<<5) /* MIME header */
70
71#define HDR_OPT_XRECIP (HDR_OPT_RECIP | HDR_OPT_EXTRACT)
72
73extern const HEADER_OPTS *header_opts_find(const char *);
74

76/* .ad
77/* .fi
78/* The Secure Mailer license must be distributed with this software.
79/* AUTHOR(S)
80/* Wietse Venema
81/* IBM T.J. Watson Research
82/* P.O. Box 704
83/* Yorktown Heights, NY 10598, USA
84/*--*/
85
86#endif
87
